name: MobiSalesTracker
description: Sales tracker for tracking van sales reps locations.

scripts.staging: modulus env set METEOR_SETTINGS "$(cat settings-development.json)" -p 'Staging' && modulus deploy -f -p 'Staging'
scripts.production: modulus env set METEOR_SETTINGS "$(cat settings-production.json)" -p 'Production' && modulus deploy -f -p 'Production'
